plugins.name: Thumbnail Resizer
plugins.description: Thumbnail Resizer streamlines the process of creating multiple sized thumbnails from a single design. With this plugin, you can:Quickly generate thumbnails in various preset sizes for popular platformsCreate custom size presets for your specific needsBatch resize selected elements with just a few clicksSave and reuse your frequently used size combinationsPerfect for social media marketers, UI/UX designers, and anyone who needs to create multiple versions of their designs efficiently. Save time and ensure consistency across all your thumbnail sizes with Thumbnail Resizer.
plugins.tagline: Quick and easy thumbnail creation for multiple sizes

plugins.name: Behind the frame
plugins.description: Опис﻿аниеСлучаются ситуации, когда объекты оказываются за фреймами и вы не знаете какие из них. Как бы вы их не нашли, при большом количестве фреймов поместить их в нужный в панели слоев не самое простое занятие, а вынести за пределы и снова внутрь не гарантирует поместить на тоже место. Этот плагин упрощает это действие.Select all out-of-frame objectsSelects all objects that are out of frames.Objects in framesPlaces all selected objects in the frames above them.Select the objects along with the frames and run the script.All selected objects will end up in the frames they visually match.Выбрать всё вне фреймовВыбирает все объекты которые находятся вне фреймов.Объекты во фреймыПомещает все выделенные объекты во фреймы над которыми находятся.Выделите объекты вместе с фреймами и запустите скрипт.Все выделенные объекты окажутся во фреймах с которыми совпадают визуально.
plugins.tagline: In order to place objects that are behind frames into frames

81981.name: Behind the frame
81981.description: Опис﻿аниеСлучаются ситуации, когда объекты оказываются за фреймами и вы не знаете какие из них. Как бы вы их не нашли, при большом количестве фреймов поместить их в нужный в панели слоев не самое простое занятие, а вынести за пределы и снова внутрь не гарантирует поместить на тоже место. Этот плагин упрощает это действие.Select all out-of-frame objectsSelects all objects that are out of frames.Objects in framesPlaces all selected objects in the frames above them.Select the objects along with the frames and run the script.All selected objects will end up in the frames they visually match.Выбрать всё вне фреймовВыбирает все объекты которые находятся вне фреймов.Объекты во фреймыПомещает все выделенные объекты во фреймы над которыми находятся.Выделите объекты вместе с фреймами и запустите скрипт.Все выделенные объекты окажутся во фреймах с которыми совпадают визуально.
81981.tagline: In order to place objects that are behind frames into frames

plugins.name: Retro Color Converter
plugins.description: Transform your Figma designs into nostalgic retro-style PNG images with flexible bit depth control. Perfect for pixel art, game assets, and vintage aesthetics.Features:- Color depth options: 6-bit, 9-bit, 12-bit- Three dithering modes: Flat, Gradient, Full- Floyd-Steinberg algorithm for smooth transitions- Auto-positioning next to original objects- One-click conversion- Supports all layer typesIdeal for retro games, pixel art, and creative effects. Complete control over color quantization and dithering.

plugins.name: Automagic Scale Generator
plugins.description: Quickly generate and manage design tokens for color palettes, typography scales, and spacing systems. It provides an interactive UI to customize color variations (including transparencies), modular or linear type and spacing scales, and then creates Figma variables for seamless design system integration. Inspired by the Automatic CSS Framework for WordPress.
plugins.tagline: Generate and manage design tokens for color palettes, typography scales and spacing systems.

131715.name: Automagic Scale Generator
131715.description: Quickly generate and manage design tokens for color palettes, typography scales, and spacing systems. It provides an interactive UI to customize color variations (including transparencies), modular or linear type and spacing scales, and then creates Figma variables for seamless design system integration. Inspired by the Automatic CSS Framework for WordPress.
131715.release_notes: Fixed the "Create color system" button not working after the last update
131715.tagline: Generate and manage design tokens for color palettes, typography scales and spacing systems.

plugins.name: Sentence case checker and converter
plugins.description: Make your typography clean, consistent, and user-friendly.Sentence Case Checker helps you scan all visible text layers in a selected frame and highlights any unintended capital letters mid-sentence — like those annoying This Is a Sentence errors.✅ Detect sentence casing issues✅ Shows all problematic phrases in a list✅ Locate each error directly on canvas✅ Convert individual words or fix all in one click✅ Real-time refresh when changing selectionSupports UI writing best practices and editorial consistency!
plugins.tagline: Automatically detect and fix mid-sentence capitalization issues in your Figma designs.

130908.name: Sentence case checker and converter
130908.description: Make your typography clean, consistent, and user-friendly.Sentence Case Checker helps you scan all visible text layers in a selected frame and highlights any unintended capital letters mid-sentence — like those annoying This Is a Sentence errors.✅ Detect sentence casing issues✅ Shows all problematic phrases in a list✅ Locate each error directly on canvas✅ Convert individual words or fix all in one click✅ Real-time refresh when changing selectionSupports UI writing best practices and editorial consistency!
130908.release_notes:
Improved sentence casing logic:
– Capitalized words after ., ?, or ! are no longer incorrectly flagged.
– Better handling of sentence boundaries to reduce false positives.
This update makes the plugin smarter and more accurate for real-world content.
130908.tagline: Automatically detect and fix mid-sentence capitalization issues in your Figma designs.

plugins.name: Magic Style Guide
plugins.description: ✨ Magic Style Guide ✨Create beautiful, clear, professional style guides — in just one click.Magic Style Guide reads all your color variables (across multiple collections, including linked variables) and text styles to instantly generate an elegant, organized, and ready-to-share style guide.Perfect for onboarding, documentation, and developer handoff — without any manual work.---🔮 Features:- One-click magic: Instantly document all text styles and color variables.- Smart descriptions: Auto-generate usage notes based on your style names.- Linked variables support: Handles both direct and linked variables across collections.- Multi-collection ready: Organizes styles beautifully even when they span several collections.- Beautiful output: Clean, professional, and fully structured style guides.---Why you'll love it:Save hours of boring documentation.Keep your design systems clear, consistent, and ready for scale.Focus on design — Magic Style Guide takes care of the rest. 🎩✨
plugins.tagline: Generate stunning style guides from Figma styles and variables — instantly!

130996.name: Magic Style Guide
130996.description: ✨ Magic Style Guide ✨Create beautiful, clear, professional style guides — in just one click.Magic Style Guide reads all your color variables (across multiple collections, including linked variables) and text styles to instantly generate an elegant, organized, and ready-to-share style guide.Perfect for onboarding, documentation, and developer handoff — without any manual work.---🔮 Features:- One-click magic: Instantly document all text styles and color variables.- Smart descriptions: Auto-generate usage notes based on your style names.- Linked variables support: Handles both direct and linked variables across collections.- Multi-collection ready: Organizes styles beautifully even when they span several collections.- Beautiful output: Clean, professional, and fully structured style guides.---Why you'll love it:Save hours of boring documentation.Keep your design systems clear, consistent, and ready for scale.Focus on design — Magic Style Guide takes care of the rest. 🎩✨
130996.release_notes:
🖋️ Text Style Layout Glow-Up
I gave the text styles section a makeover. It’s now sharper, more elegant, and way easier to scan. Like a well-dressed typeface at a job interview.

🧠 Smart Descriptions for Humans
Now automatically adds short, helpful descriptions based on text sizes and color names. No more guessing what “Primary / Surface / Subtle” actually means.

🪄 New Plugin UI (because vibes matter)
The plugin window got a redesign — cleaner layout, a proper call-to-action, and even a lovely image… just for the aesthetic. Nothing essential, but everything nice.
130996.tagline: Generate stunning style guides from Figma styles and variables — instantly!

plugins.name: Calculator
plugins.description: A handy Figma plugin designed to accelerate your workflow by instantly calculating totals from numerical values in text layers. Whether you're working on financial interfaces, data tables, or statistical visualizations, this tool ensures accuracy and efficiency with minimal effort.How It Works:Automatic Number Detection:Quickly detects and extracts numbers from your selected text layers, effortlessly handling various formats:Simple numbers: 1234Decimal numbers: 1234.56 or 1234,56Numbers with thousand separators: 1,234.56 or 1.234,56Real-Time Calculation:Instantly calculates and displays the total sum of all detected numbers from your selected layers. Update your selection, and the total recalculates automatically.Detailed View:Offers an expandable detailed view showing each processed text layer along with its extracted numeric value, making it easy to verify and manage your data.Key Features:Real-Time Updates: Automatically refreshes calculations as your selection changes.Adaptive Interface: Collapses the detailed view when no layers are selected, keeping your workspace clean.Theme Support: Fully compatible with both light and dark Figma themes for optimal visibility.Native Integration: Utilizes Figma’s native UI components for a seamless experience.Who Is It For?This plugin is ideal for designers who frequently handle numerical data within their designs. By automating the calculation process, it allows you to save valuable time and focus more on the creative aspects of your projects, enhancing productivity and accuracy.
plugins.tagline: Select text layers, instantly calculate their numerical values in real time.

127100.name: Calculator
127100.description: A handy Figma plugin designed to accelerate your workflow by instantly calculating totals from numerical values in text layers. Whether you're working on financial interfaces, data tables, or statistical visualizations, this tool ensures accuracy and efficiency with minimal effort.How It Works:Automatic Number Detection:Quickly detects and extracts numbers from your selected text layers, effortlessly handling various formats:Simple numbers: 1234Decimal numbers: 1234.56 or 1234,56Numbers with thousand separators: 1,234.56 or 1.234,56Real-Time Calculation:Instantly calculates and displays the total sum of all detected numbers from your selected layers. Update your selection, and the total recalculates automatically.Detailed View:Offers an expandable detailed view showing each processed text layer along with its extracted numeric value, making it easy to verify and manage your data.Key Features:Real-Time Updates: Automatically refreshes calculations as your selection changes.Adaptive Interface: Collapses the detailed view when no layers are selected, keeping your workspace clean.Theme Support: Fully compatible with both light and dark Figma themes for optimal visibility.Native Integration: Utilizes Figma’s native UI components for a seamless experience.Who Is It For?This plugin is ideal for designers who frequently handle numerical data within their designs. By automating the calculation process, it allows you to save valuable time and focus more on the creative aspects of your projects, enhancing productivity and accuracy.
127100.release_notes:
Enhanced Number Parsing:
Improved handling of thousand separators (1,000 and 1.000)
Better detection of decimal points vs thousand separators
Support for both European (1.234,56) and American (1,234.56) number formats
Currency Support:
Added recognition of currency symbols ($, €, £, ₴, ¥, ₿)
Support for currency codes (USD, EUR, GBP, UAH, JPY, BTC, ETH, USDT)
Handles currency notation at both start and end of numbers (e.g., "$1,000" and "1,000 USD")
Error Handling:
Added informative messages when no text layers are selected
Added feedback when no valid numeric values are found
127100.tagline: Select text layers, instantly calculate their numerical values in real time.

plugins.name: Sudoku Frame
plugins.description: Boost your design workflow with Sudoku Frame, the ultimate Figma plugin for creating customizable Sudoku tables in seconds! Perfect for designers, prototypers, and puzzle enthusiasts, this plugin lets you generate Sudoku grids with 4 difficulty levels—Easy, Medium, Hard, and Expert. Choose between Numbers or Letters to suit your project’s style. With the Show Outlines mode, reveal answers effortlessly while keeping them hidden in the default view—ideal for testing, prototyping, or adding interactive elements to your designs.Whether you're mocking up educational tools, game interfaces, or creative layouts, Sudoku Frame streamlines the process with precision and flexibility. Download now and start designing smarter!

plugins.name: C2O - Clutter to Organised
plugins.description: C2O (Clutter to Organized) is a simple and effective Figma plugin that helps designers automatically arrange frames into a structured layout. If your Figma file feels cluttered, C2O will neatly organize everything in just one click.✨ How It Works:1️⃣ Rename your frames with a prefix inside square brackets.Example:[1a] Login Page (Row 1, Frame A)[1b] Password Entry (Row 1, Frame B)[2a] Dashboard (Row 2, Frame A)2️⃣ Run the plugin and click "Organize Frames".3️⃣ Your frames will be arranged into clearly structured groups, placed in order from top to bottom.Frames without the naming pattern will be placed in an "Others" group at the bottom.💡 Why Use C2O?Eliminates manual alignment work and saves time.Keeps designs structured and easy to navigate.Improves team collaboration by maintaining a clean layout.Click “Try it out” and bring order to your Figma files effortlessly! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Structure your Figma frames in One Click!

119833.name: C2O - Clutter to Organised
119833.description: C2O (Clutter to Organized) is a simple and effective Figma plugin that helps designers automatically arrange frames into a structured layout. If your Figma file feels cluttered, C2O will neatly organize everything in just one click.✨ How It Works:1️⃣ Rename your frames with a prefix inside square brackets.Example:[1a] Login Page (Row 1, Frame A)[1b] Password Entry (Row 1, Frame B)[2a] Dashboard (Row 2, Frame A)2️⃣ Run the plugin and click "Organize Frames".3️⃣ Your frames will be arranged into clearly structured groups, placed in order from top to bottom.Frames without the naming pattern will be placed in an "Others" group at the bottom.💡 Why Use C2O?Eliminates manual alignment work and saves time.Keeps designs structured and easy to navigate.Improves team collaboration by maintaining a clean layout.Click “Try it out” and bring order to your Figma files effortlessly! 🚀

plugins.name: Variable Color Recommender
plugins.description: Ensure color consistency across your design system with ease. This plugin detects colors in text and design elements that aren’t part of your variables library and suggests the closest matching colors based on precise RGB calculations. Version 1.0 supports fills for text and design elements but does not include stroke colors. Stroke support will be added in Version 2.0.
plugins.tagline: Select an element, get the closest matching variable from your design system.

117869.name: Variable Color Recommender
117869.description: Ensure color consistency across your design system with ease. This plugin detects colors in text and design elements that aren’t part of your variables library and suggests the closest matching colors based on precise RGB calculations. Version 1.0 supports fills for text and design elements but does not include stroke colors. Stroke support will be added in Version 2.0.
117869.tagline: Select an element, get the closest matching variable from your design system.

plugins.name: Font Theme
plugins.description: Not all fonts that go well together match the theme of your design. This AI powered plugin lets you describe your design and its intended audience and then suggests font pairs that match the theme you entered. You can also simply just type in the vibe or feeling you want the font to evoke.The best part? You can save the fonts and all their weights as text styles in your Figma with the click of a button!The text styles will save the font weights as numbers because that's how developers code font weights. This will ease the communication with your developers because you'll get familiar with how they refer to font weights.
plugins.tagline: Search for font pairs to match the feeling of your design.

122088.name: Font Theme
122088.description: Not all fonts that go well together match the theme of your design. This AI powered plugin lets you describe your design and its intended audience and then suggests font pairs that match the theme you entered. You can also simply just type in the vibe or feeling you want the font to evoke.The best part? You can save the fonts and all their weights as text styles in your Figma with the click of a button!The text styles will save the font weights as numbers because that's how developers code font weights. This will ease the communication with your developers because you'll get familiar with how they refer to font weights.
122088.release_notes: Now creates matches from all Figma fonts compared to only Google fonts in the previous version.
122088.tagline: Search for font pairs to match the feeling of your design.

plugins.name: Adtraction Table Generator
plugins.description: A specialized Figma plugin designed exclusively for Adtraction employees to streamline the process of converting complex Excel reports into presentation-ready Figma tables.Key Features:📊 Automatically splits large Excel files into separate tables🎯 Purpose-built for Adtraction's reporting structure:Koncern (Group) tablesModerbolag (Parent company) tablesOther financial data tables🎨 Maintains Adtraction's brand typography with Lexend font🔍 Preview tables before generation⚡️ Bulk processing of multiple tables from a single Excel file🔒 Local processing for data securityPerfect Use Case:Designed specifically for Adtraction's quarterly and annual financial reporting workflow. When you have one large Excel file containing multiple tables of financial data, this plugin automatically:Identifies different table sectionsSplits them into separate tablesApplies appropriate styling based on table type (koncern/moderbolag)Generates all tables with consistent formattingIdeal for:Adtraction financial team membersCorporate communications staffAnyone working with Adtraction's financial reports in FigmaThis is a niche tool optimized for Adtraction's specific needs, making the process of converting financial Excel data into presentation-ready Figma tables quick and consistent.Note: This plugin is primarily intended for Adtraction employees and is optimized for their internal Excel report format and brand guidelines.
plugins.tagline: Transform Adtraction Excel reports into perfectly formatted Figma tables  ✨

When you have one large Excel file containing multiple tables of financial data, this plugin automatically:Identifies different table sectionsSplits them into separate tablesApplies appropriate styling based on table type (koncern/moderbolag)Generates all tables with consistent formattingIdeal for:Adtraction financial team membersCorporate communications staffAnyone working with Adtraction's financial reports in FigmaThis is a niche tool optimized for Adtraction's specific needs, making the process of converting financial Excel data into presentation-ready Figma tables quick and consistent.Note: This plugin is primarily intended for Adtraction employees and is optimized for their internal Excel report format and brand guidelines.

plugins.name: Margin Detective
plugins.description: Say goodbye to inconsistencies and hello to perfectly aligned designs. With Margin Detective, you get a vigilant partner that scans your frames, checks margins and spacings, and ensures they align with your document variables. When something’s off, it offers smart corrections or swaps, keeping your design cohesive and professional.Whether you’re fine-tuning layouts or auditing a massive project, Margin Detective empowers you to maintain flawless alignment, harmony, and consistency—all with the efficiency of a true design detective.Design smarter. Stay consistent. Every pixel, every time.
plugins.tagline: Detect. Correct. Perfect your design.

plugins.name: Jam Session
plugins.description: Jam Session lets you run inclusive activities in FigJam.Start a session as a facilitator and let anybody join by sharing a QR code, unique link or session code. Take control of hybrid or in-person workshop facilities and make sure everyone can inclusively participate.Learn more at www.jamsesh.xyzHow to useStart a session with the plugin. Set a timer, an activity prompt, and how you want notes to appear on the board.Share the QR code or a link with participants. Anybody can join your session on any device through our companion web-app.Watch submissions roll in. Wait until the timer finishes or end the session early. Affinity map, synth or destroy the results as you please.Whether you're running an in-person workshop with a FigJam board as the source of truth, or doing something hybrid and just want to ensure everyone can contribute, Jam Session is the tool you never knew you needed.Keeps the fun alive in workshopsAvoids firewall or laggy machine issues for diverse participantsGives you control of how submissions appearJam Session is in public beta.A FigJam plugin with this many moving parts may have rough edges. If you find something weird or didn't work, please don't hesitate to reach out to the support email and we'll get right on it.

accepted.name: dano
accepted.description: i do design and design activities

plugins.tagline: Join FigJam activities from anywhere! Run sessions anybody can join from any device.

plugins.name: 角落艺术家
plugins.description: In the new version of "Corner Artist," I've added a language switch feature between Chinese and English. Here, you can freely switch to your preferred language as needed.The new version optimizes the user experience, making the overall UI more refined and convenient.By clicking the button, you can randomly switch to your favorite gradient colors.Additionally, the new version introduces a "Random Corner Radius" feature, allowing you to choose the layer you want to modify and adjust the corner radius strength.Here, the higher the value, the smaller the corner radius strength.I’ve used the superellipse corner radius formula:|x/a|^n + |y/b|^n = 1When n = 2, it’s a regular ellipse;When n < 2, it’s a superellipse;The smaller the value of n, the closer the corners are to right angles.For those interested, you can explore the formula on your own; I’ll post it in the comments.When you choose a corner radius strength less than 1, you'll also receive stars as a bonus.That's about it for the new features. Feel free to experience and save them!
plugins.tagline: Making the overall UI more refined and convenient.

113419.name: 角落艺术家
113419.description: In the new version of "Corner Artist," I've added a language switch feature between Chinese and English. Here, you can freely switch to your preferred language as needed.The new version optimizes the user experience, making the overall UI more refined and convenient.By clicking the button, you can randomly switch to your favorite gradient colors.Additionally, the new version introduces a "Random Corner Radius" feature, allowing you to choose the layer you want to modify and adjust the corner radius strength.Here, the higher the value, the smaller the corner radius strength.I’ve used the superellipse corner radius formula:|x/a|^n + |y/b|^n = 1When n = 2, it’s a regular ellipse;When n < 2, it’s a superellipse;The smaller the value of n, the closer the corners are to right angles.For those interested, you can explore the formula on your own; I’ll post it in the comments.When you choose a corner radius strength less than 1, you'll also receive stars as a bonus.That's about it for the new features. Feel free to experience and save them!
113419.tagline: Making the overall UI more refined and convenient.

plugins.name: Pancake Work
plugins.description: Guideline (Vietnamese):Plugin giúp link figma design vào một issue của Pancake WorkCác bước thực hiện:Vào Pancake Work copy link issueChọn node cần gắn link, chú ý đánh dấu ready for dev cho node đó trước (nếu cần) (node nên là frame/section)Mở plugin Pancake Work, paste link issue vào ô đầu tiên (Plugin có lưu lại link với mỗi node)Click vào ô thứ 2, nhấn Cmd + L (với Mac), hoặc Ctrl + L (với Windows) để lấy link figma, rồi pasteNhấn Create/UpdateRoadmap:Update English guidelineListen feedback from Pancake designers to improveMaybe link for KanbanHmmm, I don't know...Copyright 2024 Pancake

plugins.name: Text With Styles
plugins.description: # Flutter Text Style InspectorA powerful Figma plugin that bridges the gap between Figma text styles and Flutter's Material Design text theme system. This plugin helps developers and designers maintain consistency between Figma designs and Flutter implementations by automatically mapping Figma text styles to their corresponding Flutter TextTheme properties.## Features### Real-time Style Inspection- Instantly view text style information for any selected text layer- Live updates as you select different text elements- Support for multiple text selection with smart duplicate filtering### Comprehensive Style Information- Displays the complete Figma text style name- Shows associated color token information- Previews the actual text content- Automatically generates corresponding Flutter TextTheme code### Smart Flutter Code Generation- Automatically maps Figma text styles to Flutter's Material Design text theme- Supports all standard Material text styles:- Headlines (Large, Medium, Small)- Titles (Large, Medium, Small)- Body text (with weight variations)- Labels (Large, Medium, Small)- Includes font weight handling for body styles (w400, w500, w600)### User-Friendly Interface- Clean, organized display of style information- Easy-to-copy Flutter code snippets- Compact, floating UI that stays out of your way- Simple click-outside-to-close functionality## How to Use1. Select any text layer(s) in your Figma design2. The plugin will automatically display:- The applied Figma text style- The color token (if available)- A preview of the text content- The equivalent Flutter TextTheme code3. Copy the generated Flutter code directly into your application## Best Practices- Name your Figma text styles to match Material Design conventions for automatic mapping- Use consistent style names to ensure accurate Flutter code generation- Apply color styles to text layers for complete token information- Select multiple text layers to quickly inspect all text styles in a componentPerfect for teams working with both Figma and Flutter, this plugin streamlines the handoff process and ensures design consistency across platforms.
plugins.tagline: Select any layer and get its texts with styles

plugins.name: Sell2Rent
plugins.description: The plugin is designed to streamline the creation of property showcase cards for various social media platforms. It automates the process by pulling property data from a source (like a CRM or spreadsheet) and generating consistent, branded cards tailored to each platform’s specifications. This ensures that property listings are efficiently and professionally promoted across different social media networks.

Select this command to apply export settings from their main components.

plugins.name: Data Bloom
plugins.description: Data Bloom is your go-to plugin for breathing life into your Figma designs. Easily replace generic dummy text with real-looking, localized content and user data tailored to your audience. Now supporting 10 languages with 10+ data type options (see below), Data Bloom will continue expanding to include more languages and data types.Supported languages:🇦🇿 Azerbaijani, 🇺🇸 English (USA), 🇩🇪 German, 🇰🇿 Kazakh, 🇰🇬 Kyrgyz, 🇷🇺 Russian, 🇹🇷 Turkish, 🇹🇲 Turkmen, 🇺🇦 Ukrainian, 🇺🇿 UzbekAvailable data types:🎲 Random: Generates a data point by randomly selecting from any of the other available data types.👫🏻 Names: Creates realistic first names, last names, or full names, with options for gender.🤪 Playful Usernames: Produces fun and quirky usernames, optionally starting with an "@" symbol.📞 Phone Numbers: Generates phone numbers with various formatting options, including country-specific domestic styles.💳 Payment card details: Helps to generate mock payment card information, such as Card numbers, Expiry date and CVV/CVC⭐️ Ratings and reviews: Generate localized generic review text from categories like "General", "Product specific" or "App feedback"📆 Date: Creates date values with customizable formats and selectable year ranges, including custom inputs.📆 Days of the week: Inserts day names (e.g., Monday, Tuesday)📆 Months: Populates layers with month names (e.g., January, February)💼 Professions: Populates layers with a diverse list of job titles and occupations.🎨 Colors: Replaces selected text layers with common color names.Whether you’re designing a prototype or building a demo, Data Bloom makes it effortless to populate text layers in seconds, ensuring your prototypes feel authentic, personalized, and polished.✦ Lightning-fast generation✦ Realistic, localized data (Names, Phone Numbers, Colors, Usernames and Professions)✦ Lightweight and Figma-friendly✦ Continuous updates with new languages and data typesReplace “lorem ipsum” forever — grow your designs with Data Bloom.🌱 How-to Guide:Run the Data Bloom plugin.Select one or multiple text layers in your design where you want to insert random data.Choose a preferred data language and data type from the list.Click “Generate Data” and the plugin will instantly populate the selected text layers based on your set preferences.

accepted.name: myravey workshop
accepted.description:
Exploring usability, interaction, and aesthetics to craft intuitive digital experiences. 

Sharing design files, prototypes, and experiments 🚀

plugins.name: Frame Manager
plugins.description: A simple but powerful tool for organizing and fixing frames in Figma. Detect duplicates, fix naming issues, and ensure proper dimensions in your design files.Full DescriptionFrame Manager helps you maintain clean and well-organized Figma files by providing essential tools for working with frames.Key Features:🔍 Duplicate Frame Detection & RemovalInstantly find frames with identical namesOption to automatically remove duplicates while keeping one instanceClean up messy files by eliminating redundant elements🏷️ Frame Name StandardizationIdentify frames with non-standard naming conventionsAutomatically fix frame names to follow consistent PascalCase formatEnforce naming consistency across your design system📏 Size OptimizationFind frames with dimensions not divisible by 2Fix frame sizes to ensure clean rendering on various displaysFind frames with non-power-of-2 dimensions for texture optimizationHow It WorksInstall the plugin and run it from the Plugins menuSelect the feature you need from the simple, intuitive interfaceGet instant feedback as the plugin detects issues or fixes problemsEnjoy a cleaner, more organized Figma filePerfect ForDesign teams working on large filesDesigners preparing assets for developersAnyone who wants to maintain consistent naming and sizing in their designsTechnical DetailsLightweight and fast - analyzes your file without lagNon-destructive - always gives you control over changesWorks with any Figma file containing framesMaintain better design hygiene and save hours of manual cleanup with Frame Manager!2025 - WildCard Studios - Art Department
plugins.tagline: Clean & organize frames: find duplicates, fix names, proper dimensions with one-click solutions.

128090.name: Frame Manager
128090.description: A simple but powerful tool for organizing and fixing frames in Figma. Detect duplicates, fix naming issues, and ensure proper dimensions in your design files.Full DescriptionFrame Manager helps you maintain clean and well-organized Figma files by providing essential tools for working with frames.Key Features:🔍 Duplicate Frame Detection & RemovalInstantly find frames with identical namesOption to automatically remove duplicates while keeping one instanceClean up messy files by eliminating redundant elements🏷️ Frame Name StandardizationIdentify frames with non-standard naming conventionsAutomatically fix frame names to follow consistent PascalCase formatEnforce naming consistency across your design system📏 Size OptimizationFind frames with dimensions not divisible by 2Fix frame sizes to ensure clean rendering on various displaysFind frames with non-power-of-2 dimensions for texture optimizationHow It WorksInstall the plugin and run it from the Plugins menuSelect the feature you need from the simple, intuitive interfaceGet instant feedback as the plugin detects issues or fixes problemsEnjoy a cleaner, more organized Figma filePerfect ForDesign teams working on large filesDesigners preparing assets for developersAnyone who wants to maintain consistent naming and sizing in their designsTechnical DetailsLightweight and fast - analyzes your file without lagNon-destructive - always gives you control over changesWorks with any Figma file containing framesMaintain better design hygiene and save hours of manual cleanup with Frame Manager!2025 - WildCard Studios - Art Department

plugins.name: CSS Variables to Figma
plugins.description: Import css variables into Figma variablesThis plugin enables you import color variables from CSS into Figma, supporting both single-mode and dual Light/Dark mode setups. It maps your CSS variables to Figma's variable modes, converting formats like OKLCH (Tailwind), HEX, RGBA, and RGB into Figma-compatible HEX values. OKLCH, P3, and HCT color values are also preserved and attached to each variable for reference.Example: .light {--color-primary: #000;}.dark {--color-primary: #fff;}How it works: Paste your CSS variables in the text area below.Click "Export to JSON" to generate a Figma-compatible variables file.Import the JSON file into Figma using the Figma Variables by Honza TomanWatch video→ how it works.Currently supported: Color variablesAttach oklch, p3 colors and HCT values to variable syntaxNext updates: Border radius variablesSpacing variablesShadows...Feedback and supportLet us know your feedback and suggestions! @sans_sherifSupport the development of this plugin buy us a coffee ☕
plugins.tagline: Import existing css variables to figma variables

133956.description: Import css variables into Figma variablesThis plugin enables you import color variables from CSS into Figma, supporting both single-mode and dual Light/Dark mode setups. It maps your CSS variables to Figma's variable modes, converting formats like OKLCH (Tailwind), HEX, RGBA, and RGB into Figma-compatible HEX values. OKLCH, P3, and HCT color values are also preserved and attached to each variable for reference.Example: .light {--color-primary: #000;}.dark {--color-primary: #fff;}How it works: Paste your CSS variables in the text area below.Click "Export to JSON" to generate a Figma-compatible variables file.Import the JSON file into Figma using the Figma Variables by Honza TomanWatch video→ how it works.Currently supported: Color variablesAttach oklch, p3 colors and HCT values to variable syntaxNext updates: Border radius variablesSpacing variablesShadows...Feedback and supportLet us know your feedback and suggestions! @sans_sherifSupport the development of this plugin buy us a coffee ☕

plugins.name: Design Feedback Lite
plugins.description: Instantly review selected frames using core UX principles. Get structured feedback, radar scoring, and real-time insights — all powered by design psychology.
plugins.tagline: Instant UX feedback on your designs — backed by psychology.

126473.name: Design Feedback Lite
126473.description: Instantly review selected frames using core UX principles. Get structured feedback, radar scoring, and real-time insights — all powered by design psychology.
126473.release_notes:
✨ Viewport-aware analysis: Mobile and desktop designs now get context-appropriate feedback.

⚠️ Contrast issues now tiered: Low, medium, and high severity for better prioritization.

💡 Smart Mode improved: Skips system layers like status bars, navs, and menu bars.

🧠 Accessibility standard toggle: Choose between WCAG 2.1 AA and AAA.

🎯 Refined touch and text size rules: Based on device context and layer type.

🎨 Sleek new UI: Modern layout, grouped controls, and better legibility.

Small plugin. Big feedback. Smarter than ever.
126473.tagline: Instant UX feedback on your designs — backed by psychology.

plugins.name: Ai Design Review
plugins.description: Transform Your Design Process with AI-powered InsightsAi Design Review is a cutting-edge Figma plugin designed to help designers optimize their work by providing AI-driven design reviews. With this plugin, you can instantly analyze your designs and receive suggestions for improvement based on best practices in typography, layout, color schemes, accessibility, and overall visual consistency.By utilizing AI technology, Ai Design Review helps you ensure that your designs adhere to industry standards, making your workflow more efficient and your designs more polished. The plugin automatically scans your design file, analyzes it against key design principles, and highlights potential issues, offering actionable insights and suggestions to improve the design's quality and user experience.Whether you're a solo designer or part of a design team, Ai Design Review will serve as your AI assistant, providing real-time feedback to enhance your design’s impact and usability.Key Features:Automated Design Analysis: Instantly scan your designs for inconsistencies, color imbalances, accessibility issues, and more.AI-Driven Recommendations: Receive intelligent suggestions for design improvements tailored to your project.Customizable Feedback: Choose the types of design elements you want to receive feedback on, such as typography, spacing, or color.Efficient Workflow: Save time and enhance collaboration by automatically detecting and fixing common design mistakes.Boost your design efficiency and improve your work with Ai Design Review — your AI-powered design assistant.
plugins.tagline: Enhance your designs with AI-powered insights for better quality and consistency

The plugin automatically scans your design file, analyzes it against key design principles, and highlights potential issues, offering actionable insights and suggestions to improve the design's quality and user experience.Whether you're a solo designer or part of a design team, Ai Design Review will serve as your AI assistant, providing real-time feedback to enhance your design’s impact and usability.Key Features:Automated Design Analysis: Instantly scan your designs for inconsistencies, color imbalances, accessibility issues, and more.AI-Driven Recommendations: Receive intelligent suggestions for design improvements tailored to your project.Customizable Feedback: Choose the types of design elements you want to receive feedback on, such as typography, spacing, or color.Efficient Workflow: Save time and enhance collaboration by automatically detecting and fixing common design mistakes.Boost your design efficiency and improve your work with Ai Design Review — your AI-powered design assistant.

Generate prompts, pick your favorite, and start designing.How to Use:Open the pluginSelect a category (UI, UX, or Graphics).Click "Generate" to get a random challenge.Keep generating until you find one you like.Copy it to Figma and start designing!Share the design with your friends and don't forget to tag me.Thanks🤍

plugins.name: Text binder for AI
plugins.description: Text Binder for AIA LLM-optimized plugin that lets you enhance text content with AI while preserving your Figma designs. Built with AI guardrails, this plugin safely extracts, processes, and updates text across multiple frames without breaking layouts or losing design fidelity.✨ Key Features🎯 AI-Ready Content ExtractionExtract text with reference tags for LLM processingMaintain exact positioning and styling informationProcess multiple frames simultaneouslyBuilt-in prompts and guardrails for AI safety🔄 Validated Content UpdatesPreview AI-generated changes before applyingIntelligent length validation for layout preservationReal-time status checks for each text elementClear warnings for potential layout impacts🚀 Getting StartedSelect your target framesExtract text with AI-friendly reference tagsUse any LLM while maintaining the safety tagsReview changes with automatic validationApply updates with confidence
plugins.tagline: AI-enhanced, design-protected

116310.description: Text Binder for AIA LLM-optimized plugin that lets you enhance text content with AI while preserving your Figma designs. plugins.name: Export Frame 2 Json
plugins.description: A plugin to customize the information of the elements in the Frame export json file .一个将Frame里的元素信息自定义导出json文件的插件。可以将模版内的结构梳理成 background 背景层、foreground 前景层 和 medias 媒体资源（用户替换图片的层）。Tips: 在交付版本中，模版内的元素（包括文字）都可以转换成图片，避免出现旋转缩放等参数，这样更好定位元素大小和位置。图层命名前缀可以用模版名称，后缀命名规则如下：背景层用「bg」媒体资源用「mask」前景素材用「sticker」（文字目前暂时转成图片用sticker命名）同类型用序号区分。导出的内容统一使用.png格式即可。
plugins.tagline: A plugin to customize the information of the elements in the Frame export json file .

114673.name: Export Frame 2 Json
114673.description: A plugin to customize the information of the elements in the Frame export json file .一个将Frame里的元素信息自定义导出json文件的插件。可以将模版内的结构梳理成 background 背景层、foreground 前景层 和 medias 媒体资源（用户替换图片的层）。Tips: 在交付版本中，模版内的元素（包括文字）都可以转换成图片，避免出现旋转缩放等参数，这样更好定位元素大小和位置。图层命名前缀可以用模版名称，后缀命名规则如下：背景层用「bg」媒体资源用「mask」前景素材用「sticker」（文字目前暂时转成图片用sticker命名）同类型用序号区分。导出的内容统一使用.png格式即可。
114673.tagline: A plugin to customize the information of the elements in the Frame export json file .

plugins.name: Figma Variable to Code
plugins.description: This plugin was created to keep Figma variables in sync with variables in the codebase.For example, you can quickly generate a sass variable for each of the color variables in your Figma file. This ensures your variables in the codebase have the same value and name as the variables in the Figma file.Load the variable collectionsChoose the collection you want to generate variables forPaste the format you want variable data to be generated in, and replace static content with the dynamic keys in the formatting listClick generateCopy the generated variables and put them in the appropriate file in your codebaseNote: If a collection contains groups of variables, each variable from each group is treated as its own unique variable.
plugins.tagline: Format data from Figma variable collections into the syntax you need for your codebase.

122624.name: Figma Variable to Code
122624.description: This plugin was created to keep Figma variables in sync with variables in the codebase.For example, you can quickly generate a sass variable for each of the color variables in your Figma file. This ensures your variables in the codebase have the same value and name as the variables in the Figma file.Load the variable collectionsChoose the collection you want to generate variables forPaste the format you want variable data to be generated in, and replace static content with the dynamic keys in the formatting listClick generateCopy the generated variables and put them in the appropriate file in your codebaseNote: If a collection contains groups of variables, each variable from each group is treated as its own unique variable.
122624.tagline: Format data from Figma variable collections into the syntax you need for your codebase.

plugins.name: Nataicons
plugins.description: A fun-themed simple open source icon featuring over 200 delightful design. A free and expansive icon library right inside Figma.🔑 Key Features200+ Unique Icons: A diverse collection to suit various design needs.Drag and Drop: Seamlessly add icons to your designs.Free for All: Use in personal and commercial projects without restrictions.Developer-Friendly: Available as React and Vue packages for easy integration.💡 How It WorksOpen plugin and browse our extensive icon collection.Drag your chosen icon directly into your file.Customize and resize as needed.🐞 Got ideas or found a bug?Comment or contact me in Threads. Your feedback helps make this plugin even better for everyone!
